name: Love Engine
description: Love Engine is a game, which on the basis on a Chinese traditional festival called Magpie Festival. To make this game have something new compared to the tradition one, our technical team had came up with an idea that composing a beautiful story happen between a man and a woman.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , Windows Windows 8ï¼Œ 8.1, Windows 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
